Are you referring to the 5% for 10 days  max $10k?If vs against 2.88% Maribank Difference = $10k x ( 5%-2.88%) x (10/365)= $5.8If vs against 4.5% Chocolate  difference =$10k x ( 5%-4.5%) x (10/365) = $1.37It is up to individual want to earn the difference during that 10 days using $10k.
